text: was a Japanese politician. Miyazawa was a member of the Liberal Democratic Party (LDP). He was the 78th Prime Minister, serving from 5 November 1991 to 9 August 1993. Miyazawa died in Tokyo at the age of 87. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1919 births Category:2007 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Japan Category:People from Hiroshima Prefecture Category:University of Tokyo alumni Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians Category:Foreign ministers of Japan Category:Chief Cabinet Secretaries of Japan Category:Ministers of finance of Japan Category:Ministers of agriculture, forestry and fisheries of Japan
title: Kiichi Miyazawa
